document.full_text: the f.d.i.c.'s power to deal with failing major banks is curtailed by its need to have the treasury as a cooperative partner, an economist writes.
document.title: the problem with the f.d.i.c.'s powers
lines_and_colors: the f.d.i.c.'s power to deal with failing major banks is curtailed by its need to have the treasury as a cooperative partner, an economist writes.
